title: Fanart for the Lady of Luminosity

embed.description: Link to the Speed Paint Video It's Wednesday! Which means I got another submission! Lux the lady of Luminosity: It's been a while since I did some sort of League of Legends fanart. This ...

body:
I made a fanart for Lux and I thought I should share it here! 

I also made a speed paint video that goes over the coloring/shading process! 
http://youtu.be/mIzYHAz8YQ0

I really want Riot to make like a VERY magical girl skin for her!

replies.body: I do agree that this is cute. Lux needs more cute skins/art.
Absolutely Stunning! As a Lux main, I concur with more Lux skins :) Stellar work fellow summoner {{champion:99}}
